item.title: 15 Scenarios That Could Stun the World in 2026

item.title: Why I Can’t Just Meet You for Dinner
item.description: The conversation always goes the same way. Someone asks if I want to join them for a meal, grab a drink, go to the movies, or some perfectly reasonable social activity that healthy people do without thinking. And when I hesitate, or decline, or try to explain why a Tuesday evening gathering might not work when I’m working Wednesday morning, I can see it in their faces and hear it in their voices: they think I’m making excuses.
